resources:
Find DaMatch Play This app is bult by HELP Help Revika Jain Lucas Park Vivian Phan Riya Roopesh Themes: Find DaMatch skip --------------------------
How to play?
-------------------------- Find the mathcing food items among the six items that appear in the two plates displayed on the screen. The player has to try and get through all the plates in the shortest amount of time. The previous five high scores will be displayed on the screen.
 the user can choose from various modes and difficulty levels. The user can also access flikr to get the images from there. --------------------------
About the author?
-------------------------- This app is built by
 Revika Jain 
 Lucas Park 
 Vivian Phan 
 Riya Roopesh
 who are students of CMPT-276
 taught by Dr Brian Fraser during Summer2020 --------------------------
